Source code for straph.Framework_tx_analysis

from straph import stream as sg
import csv
import os
import time
import json
import numpy as np
from collections import defaultdict



[docs]def sg_to_json(S, path_output, part_nb):
    fp = open(path_output + "SG.json", 'a')

    dict_int_2_node_label, _ = S.transform_links_label_to_int(index=True)
    print("Nb nodes :", len(S.nodes), " Nb links :", len(S.links))

    degrees = S.degrees()
    S.set_card_E()
    S.set_card_W()
    sg_json = {"time_window": S.times,
               "nb_nodes": len(S.nodes),
               "nb_links": len(S.links),
               "n_V": S.nb_nodes(),
               "n_E": S.nb_links(),
               "card_W": S.card_W,
               "card_E": S.card_E}
    d_values = degrees.values()
    mean_degree = sum(d_values) / len(d_values)
    max_degree = max(d_values)
    min_degree = min(d_values)
    std_degree = np.std(list(d_values))

    sg_json["mean_degree"] = mean_degree
    sg_json["max_degree"] = max_degree
    sg_json["min_degree"] = min_degree
    sg_json["std_degree"] = std_degree

    time_connected_components = time.time()
    wbcc = S.weakly_bounded_connected_components()
    print("\nNb Weakly bounded connected Components:", len(wbcc))
    size_components = [len(c) for c in wbcc]
    print("Size biggest wbc components :", max(size_components))
    print("Mean size wbc components :", np.mean(size_components))
    print("Time WBC Components :", time.time() - time_connected_components)

    sg_json["n_wcc"] = len(wbcc)
    sg_json["max_size_wcc"] = max(size_components)
    sg_json["mean_size_wcc"] = np.mean(size_components)

    time_connected_components = time.time()
    print("Begin SCC_Stream")
    SCC_stream = S.compute_scc_stream()
    print("\t SCC_Stream computed !")
    SCC_stream.compute_links()
    print("\t SCC Stream _links computed !")
    print("\nNb Strongly Connected Components:", SCC_stream.size())
    size_components = [c.size() for c in SCC_stream.c_nodes]
    print("Size biggest scc components :", max(size_components))
    print("Mean size scc components :", np.mean(size_components))
    print("Time SCC Components :", time.time() - time_connected_components)

    sg_json["n_scc"] = SCC_stream.size()
    sg_json["max_size_scc"] = max(size_components)
    sg_json["mean_size_scc"] = np.mean(size_components)

    time_k_cores = time.time()
    Kcores = SCC_stream.get_kcores()
    for k in Kcores:
        sg_json["n_" + str(k) + "_core"] = len(set([n[0] for n in Kcores[k]]))
        sg_json["suface_" + str(k) + "_core"] = sum([n[2] - n[1] for n in Kcores[k]])
        print("k :", k, "number of unique nodes in cores (v2) :", len(set([n[0] for n in Kcores[k]])))
    print("\nTime K-cores from scc :", time.time() - time_k_cores)
    json.dump(sg_json, fp)
    fp.write('\n')

    links_to_json(S, path_output, wbcc, SCC_stream, Kcores, part_nb, dict_int_2_node_label)
    nodes_to_json(S, path_output, degrees, wbcc, SCC_stream, Kcores, part_nb, dict_int_2_node_label)

    del SCC_stream, Kcores, S




[docs]def nodes_to_json(S, path_output, degrees, wbcc, SCC_stream, Kcores, part_nb, dict_label_nodes):
    fp = open(path_output + "nodes_part_" + str(part_nb) + ".json", 'a')
    N = S.neighborhood()
    NoN = S.nb_neighbors()
    in_Kcores = {n: defaultdict(list) for n in S.nodes}
    for k in Kcores:
        for u in Kcores[k]:
            in_Kcores[u[0]][k] += [u[1], u[2]]
    occurences_node_scc = defaultdict(int)
    for c_n in SCC_stream.c_nodes:
        for n in c_n.nodes:
            occurences_node_scc[n] += 1
    for n, p in zip(S.nodes, S.node_presence):
        if len(p) > 2:
            bi = [t0 - t1 for t1, t0 in zip(p[1::2], p[2::2])]
            m_bi = np.mean(bi)
            std_bi = np.std(bi)
        else:
            m_bi = 0
            std_bi = 0
        nodes_json = {"node_id": dict_label_nodes[n],
                      "presence": sum([t1 - t0 for t0, t1 in zip(p[::2], p[1::2])]),
                      "degree": degrees[n],
                      "nb_of_neighbors": NoN[n],
                      "mean_time_between_intervals": m_bi,
                      "std_time_between_intervals": std_bi,
                      "mean_degree_neighborhood": np.mean([degrees[v] for v in N[n]]),
                      "std_degree_neighborhood": np.std([degrees[v] for v in N[n]]),
                      "nb_occurences_SCC": occurences_node_scc[n],
                      }
        for k in in_Kcores[n]:
            nodes_json["nb_occurence_" + str(k) + "_core"] = len(in_Kcores[n][k]) / 2
            nodes_json["surface_" + str(k) + "_core"] = sum(
                [t1 - t0 for t0, t1 in zip(in_Kcores[n][k][::2], in_Kcores[n][k][1::2])])
        json.dump(nodes_json, fp)
        fp.write('\n')
    return




[docs]def links_to_json(S, path_output, wbcc, SCC_stream, Kcores, part_nb, dict_label_nodes):
    fp = open(path_output + "links_part_" + str(part_nb) + ".json", 'a')
    occurences_link_scc = defaultdict(int)
    occurences_inside_scc = defaultdict(list)
    cnt_isol = 0
    for c_n in SCC_stream.c_nodes:
        if c_n.size() > 1:
            for l in c_n.link_presence:
                ni = len(c_n.link_presence[l]) / 2
                occurences_link_scc[l] += 1
                occurences_inside_scc[l].append(ni)
        else:
            cnt_isol += 1
    print("Nb Isolated scc:", cnt_isol)
    for l, lp in zip(S.links, S.link_presence):
        if len(lp) > 2:
            bi = [t0 - t1 for t1, t0 in zip(lp[1::2], lp[2::2])]
            m_bi = np.mean(bi)
            std_bi = np.std(bi)
        else:
            m_bi = 0
            std_bi = 0
        links_json = {"src_id": dict_label_nodes[l[0]],
                      "dst_id": dict_label_nodes[l[1]],
                      "surface": sum([t1 - t0 for t0, t1 in zip(lp[::2], lp[1::2])]),
                      "nb_occurences": len(lp) / 2,
                      "mean_time_between_intervals": m_bi,
                      "std_time_between_intervals": std_bi,
                      "nb_occurences_SCC": occurences_link_scc[l],
                      "mean_occurences_inside_SCC": np.mean(occurences_inside_scc[l])
                      }
        #   counter_pckt[i],
        #   counter_weight[i],
        #   counter_bytes[i],
        #   dict_protocol[i],
        json.dump(links_json, fp)
        fp.write('\n')
    return




[docs]def get_time_by_slice(file_input, limit_interact):
    t_by_slice = [0]  # First time
    ignore_header = True  # Ignore header
    cnt = 0
    with open(file_input, 'r') as input:
        reader = csv.reader(input, delimiter=';')
        for i in reader:
            if ignore_header:
                ignore_header = False
                continue
            line = i
            if line[1] == "0" or line[1] == line[2]:  # !! IGNORE MINING OPERATION !! + NO SELF LOOP
                continue
            cnt += 1
            if cnt == limit_interact:
                cnt = 0
                t_by_slice.append(float(i[0]))
        t_by_slice.append(float(i[0]))  # Last time
    return list(reversed(t_by_slice))




[docs]def maj_propagation_struct(end_time, id, current_time, element, time_struct, struct, time_bins):
    if id >= len(struct):
        struct.append(element)
        time_struct.append([end_time, current_time + time_bins])
    elif time_struct[id][-1] >= current_time:
        time_struct[id][-1] = current_time + time_bins
    else:
        time_struct[id] += [end_time, current_time + time_bins]




[docs]def maj_struct_with_propagation(end_time, id, current_time, element, time_struct, struct):
    if id >= len(struct):
        struct.append(element)
        time_struct.append([current_time, end_time])
    elif time_struct[id][-1] >= current_time:
        time_struct[id][-1] = end_time
    else:
        time_struct[id] += [current_time, end_time]




[docs]def maj_struct(current_time, id, element, time_struct, struct, time_bins):
    if id >= len(struct):
        struct.append(element)
        time_struct.append([current_time, current_time + time_bins])
    elif time_struct[id][-1] >= current_time:
        time_struct[id][-1] = current_time + time_bins
    else:
        time_struct[id] += [current_time, current_time + time_bins]




[docs]def stream_graph_from_csv_to_json(file_input, path_output,
                                  time_bins,
                                  limit_interact=100000):
    cnt = 0
    part_nb = 0
    nodes = []
    node_presence = []
    links = []
    link_presence = []
    dict_node_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(dict_node_presence))
    dict_link_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(dict_link_presence))

    still_nodes = []
    still_node_presence = []
    still_links = []
    still_link_presence = []
    still_dict_node_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(still_dict_node_presence))
    still_dict_link_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(still_dict_link_presence))

    t_by_slice = get_time_by_slice(file_input, limit_interact)  #  First pass to split into slices of the same number of
    # interactions
    b = t_by_slice.pop()
    e = t_by_slice.pop()
    ignore_header = True
    with open(file_input, 'r') as input:
        reader = csv.reader(input, delimiter=';')
        for i in reader:
            if ignore_header:
                ignore_header = False
                continue
            line = i
            if line[1] == "0" or line[1]==line[2]: # !! IGNORE MINING OPERATION !! + NO SELF LOOP
                continue
            cnt += 1
            current_time = float(line[0])

            if cnt == limit_interact:  # Save results
                print()
                print("Nb lines read :", cnt)
                cnt = 0  # Restart Counter
                time_extract = time.time()
                S = sg.stream_graph(times=[b, e],
                                    nodes=nodes,
                                    node_presence=node_presence,
                                    links=links,
                                    link_presence=link_presence,
                                    bins=time_bins
                                    )
                print("Time extraction :", time.time() - time_extract)
                time_stats = time.time()
                ##################################### LOURD
                sg_to_json(S, path_output, part_nb)  # DU LOURD
                ##################################### DU TRES LOURD
                part_nb += 1

                print("Time stats :", time.time() - time_stats)
                time_extract = time.time()

                b = e
                e = t_by_slice.pop()

                nodes = still_nodes
                node_presence = still_node_presence
                links = still_links
                link_presence = still_link_presence
                dict_node_presence = still_dict_node_presence
                dict_node_presence.default_factory = lambda: len(dict_node_presence)  # It was hard to debug...
                dict_link_presence = still_dict_link_presence
                dict_link_presence.default_factory = lambda: len(dict_link_presence)

                still_nodes = []
                still_node_presence = []
                still_links = []
                still_link_presence = []
                still_dict_node_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(still_dict_node_presence))
                still_dict_link_presence = defaultdict(lambda: len(still_dict_link_presence))
            # For the propagation of information between time windows
            if current_time > (e - time_bins):
                id_n1 = still_dict_node_presence[line[1]]
                maj_propagation_struct(e, id_n1, current_time, line[1], still_node_presence, still_nodes, time_bins)

                id_n2 = still_dict_node_presence[line[2]]
                maj_propagation_struct(e, id_n2, current_time, line[2], still_node_presence, still_nodes, time_bins)

                id_link = still_dict_link_presence[(line[1], line[2])]
                maj_propagation_struct(e, id_link, current_time, (line[1], line[2]), still_link_presence, still_links,
                                       time_bins)

                id_n1 = dict_node_presence[line[1]]
                maj_struct_with_propagation(e, id_n1, current_time, line[1], node_presence, nodes)

                id_n2 = dict_node_presence[line[2]]
                maj_struct_with_propagation(e, id_n2, current_time, line[2], node_presence, nodes)

                id_link = dict_link_presence[(line[1], line[2])]
                maj_struct_with_propagation(e, id_link, current_time, (line[1], line[2]), link_presence, links)
            else:
                id_n1 = dict_node_presence[line[1]]
                maj_struct(current_time, id_n1, line[1], node_presence, nodes, time_bins)

                id_n2 = dict_node_presence[line[2]]
                maj_struct(current_time, id_n2, line[2], node_presence, nodes, time_bins)

                id_link = dict_link_presence[(line[1], line[2])]
                maj_struct(current_time, id_link, (line[1], line[2]), link_presence, links, time_bins)

        # LAST PASS :
        nodes += still_nodes
        node_presence += still_node_presence
        links += still_links
        link_presence += still_link_presence
        print("Nb lines :", cnt)
        S = sg.stream_graph(times=[b, e],
                            nodes=nodes,
                            node_presence=node_presence,
                            links=links,
                            link_presence=link_presence,
                            bins=time_bins
                            )
        print("Time extraction :", time.time() - time_extract)
        sg_to_json(S, path_output, part_nb)
    return



if __name__ == '__main__':
    #######################################################
    #       NICAGE (devenir vieux et kiffer estrosi)      #
    #######################################################
    os.nice(9)
    ###########################################
    #   EXTRACT STREAM GRAPH                  #
    ###########################################
    __directory__ = "/data/rannou/data/Transactions_2016_csv/"  # WOOLTHORPE
    # __directory__ = "/home/leo/Data_Stream/?"           #TRT
    # __directory__ = "/home/leo/Dev/?"             #LIP6
    __file__ = "tx_2016.csv"

    path_csv = __directory__ + __file__
    time_begin = 0
    # time_bins = 86400  # Jack Bauer format
    time_bins = 36000  # Jack Bauer/2 - 2
    limit_interact = 10000

    directory_stats = __directory__ + "/stats/"
    print("Delta presence : ", time_bins)

    stream_graph_from_csv_to_json(path_csv, directory_stats, time_bins, limit_interact)
    # break
